title: ReactJS & React Native Mastery
description: Master both ReactJS and React Native to develop modern web and mobile applications. This comprehensive course covers core React concepts, state management, component design, React Native development, and deploying full-stack apps for both web and mobile platforms.
about: This course is designed to give you a deep understanding of both ReactJS for building dynamic web applications and React Native for creating cross-platform mobile apps. You'll learn about JSX, hooks, component lifecycle, state management with Redux, and build native mobile apps with React Native, covering both Android and iOS development.

highlights.name: Core React Concepts
highlights.description: Understand JSX, components, hooks, props, state, and lifecycle methods.

highlights.name: Advanced React Patterns
highlights.description: Learn advanced React patterns like context API, HOC, render props, and custom hooks.

highlights.name: State Management with Redux
highlights.description: Manage complex app states using Redux, Redux Thunk, and Redux Saga.

highlights.name: React Native Development
highlights.description: Build mobile applications for both iOS and Android using React Native.

highlights.name: Web & Mobile App Deployment
highlights.description: Deploy React web apps to production using tools like Netlify, Vercel, and React Native apps to app stores.

roles.title: React Developer
roles.description: Develop responsive and high-performance user interfaces for web applications using ReactJS.

roles.title: Mobile App Developer
roles.description: Build mobile applications for iOS and Android using React Native.

roles.title: Full Stack Developer
roles.description: Integrate ReactJS with back-end technologies to build full-stack applications.

roles.title: Frontend Engineer
roles.description: Design and implement interactive UI components using ReactJS.

faq.question: Do I need prior programming knowledge for this course?
faq.answer: Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is recommended but not mandatory. The course starts with the fundamentals of ReactJS and React Native.

faq.question: What projects will I work on during this course?
faq.answer: You will build real-world applications such as a To-Do app, E-commerce website, and a mobile app for both iOS and Android using React Native.

faq.question: Will the course cover mobile app deployment?
faq.answer: Yes, the course includes lessons on deploying React Native apps to the Apple App Store and Google Play Store.

faq.question: Will I receive a certificate after completing the course?
faq.answer: Yes, a certificate will be provided upon successful completion of the course.

faq.question: What tools are required for this course?
faq.answer: You will need Node.js, NPM, a code editor like Visual Studio Code, and tools like Expo and Android Studio for React Native development.
